author: oheger
msg: Rather than calling static methods of PropertyConverter, the
ListDelimiterHandler is now used to escape and to split property values.

author: oheger
msg: PropertiesConfiguration now uses its ListDelimiterHandler when saving its data.
The original code for saving properties file was moved into
LegacyListDelimiterHandler. The new code just delegates to the list delimiter
handler for the correct escaping of properties. Note that it was necessary to

author: oheger
msg: The delimiter handler is now used to split properties that are added to the
configuration. Because per default list splitting is now disabled a number of
test cases had to be adapted.

author: oheger
msg: This is the list delimiter handler implementation to be used by new
